docs.text: Cardboard Storage Box Today, I cut and assembled a cardboard box to use for storage in the future. First, I downloaded the provided CDR file out of Google Drive. I then ran the file through the laser cutter and took out the cardboard. This is the box after the cut. I folded in all the parts of the box to ensure that they assembled nicely. Here is the box after I folded it all together and hot glued it:
docs.title: Storage Box
